title: Ep. 299 - Fake Hate Crimes, Real State Crimes
description:
Jussie Smollett’s ridiculous story finally falls apart, and the FBI’s even more ridiculous story does too. We analyze why Americans buy hoaxes. Then, national emergencies are not a national emergency, and the wall just got a couple hundred miles longer! Date: 02-18-2019
